mapper.select: SELECT c.cId, p.pName, p.pImg, c.count, p.pPrice, (c.count * p.pPrice) as money FROM tr_cart c, tr_member m, tr_product p WHERE m.userId = c.userId AND p.pNo = c.pNo AND c.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY cId DESC
SELECT NVL(SUM(pPrice * count), 0) money FROM tr_product p, tr_cart c WHERE p.pNo = c.pNo AND c.userId = #{userId}

SELECT p.pName, p.pImg, c.count, p.pPrice, c.cId, c.userId, p.pNo, m.userName, m.userAddr, m.userPhone, (c.count * p.pPrice) as money FROM tr_member m, tr_product p, tr_cart c WHERE m.userId = c.userId AND p.pNo = c.pNo AND c.cId = #{cId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tr_order(oId, userId, rName, rAddr, rPhone, oMemo, oDate, oTotal, delivery) VALUES(#{oId}, #{userId}, #{rName}, #{rAddr}, #{rPhone}, #{oMemo}, #{oDate}, #{oTotal}, DEFAULT)
INSERT INTO tr_orderDetails(oNo, oId, pNo, count) SELECT sq_oDetails.NEXTVAL, #{oId}, pNo, count FROM tr_cart WHERE cId = #{cId}
